clinical_study.brief_title: Music and Colposcopy in Women With Cervical Dysplasia.
clinical_study.official_title: Does Mozart Reduces Anxiety in Women With Cervical Dysplasia? A Randomized Controlled Trial.

lead_sponsor.agency: Zydolab - Institute of Cytology and Immune Cytochemistry

clinical_study.source: Zydolab - Institute of Cytology and Immune Cytochemistry

brief_summary.textblock: To assess the effect of music during colposcopy on womenÂ´s anxiety.

primary_outcome.description: Each women completes the state anxiety questionnaire (state-trait anxiety inventory [STAI]) 10 minutes before and 10 minutes after colposcopy. The difference in scores before and after colposcopy will be measured.

secondary_outcome.description: Each women completes the state anxiety questionnaire (state-trait anxiety inventory [STAI]) 10 minutes after colposcopy.
The difference in heart rate before and after colposcopy will be measured.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- women referred for colposcopy due to cervical abnormalities
- We included women if they attended colposcopy for the first time
Exclusion Criteria:
- pregnant women
- presence of a language barrier
- known anxiety disorder or depression
- history of conization or other treatments on the cervix uteri
- known oncological disorder
- auditory defect
- cardiovascular disease
- inadequate colposcopy
